content: प्रवर्तनं {@--1@} Going on, moving forward. {@--2@} Beginning, commencement. {@--3@} Setting on foot, founding, establishing, instituting. {@--4@} Prompting, urging, stimulating, inciting. {@--5@} Engaging in, applying oneself to. {@--6@} Happening, coming to <ab>pass.</ab> {@--7@} Activity, action. {@--8@} Behaviour, conduct, procedure. {@--9@} Directing, superintending. {@--10@} Employment. {@--11@} Exhortation. --ना Inciting or prompting to action.
